languages.text: "Такой порядок вещей установил не Администратум, а предыдущие Вольные Торговцы. Заверяю, ваше участие в суде — это не только дань древней традиции, но и крайняя необходимость".

"This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."
languages.original_text: "Такой порядок вещей установил не Администратум, а предыдущие Вольные Торговцы. Заверяю, ваше участие в суде — это не только дань древней традиции, но и крайняя необходимость".

traits.locale_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

"This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

"This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

languages.text: "Diese Ordnung der Dinge wurde von früheren Freihändlern eingeführt, nicht vom Administratum. Ich versichere Euch, dass Eure Teilnahme vor Gericht nicht nur eine Huldigung alter Traditionen ist, sondern eine dringende Notwendigkeit."
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Ordnung der Dinge wurde von früheren Freihändlern eingeführt, nicht vom Administratum. Ich versichere Euch, dass Eure Teilnahme vor Gericht nicht nur eine Huldigung alter Traditionen ist, sondern eine dringende Notwendigkeit."

languages.text: « Ces dispositions ont été prises à l'initiative de vos prédécesseurs, et non pas de l'Administratum. Je vous assure que votre participation à l'administration de la justice n'est pas seulement un hommage à une ancienne tradition, mais aussi une nécessité impérieuse. »
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: « Ces dispositions ont été prises à l'initiative de vos prédécesseurs, et non pas de l'Administratum. Je vous assure que votre participation à l'administration de la justice n'est pas seulement un hommage à une ancienne tradition, mais aussi une nécessité impérieuse. »

languages.text: “这样的规定并不是帝国内政部制定的，而是历代行商浪人制定的。我可以向您保证，您的出庭不仅是对王朝古老传统的尊重，也同样出于迫切的实际需要。”
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: “这样的规定并不是帝国内政部制定的，而是历代行商浪人制定的。我可以向您保证，您的出庭不仅是对王朝古老传统的尊重，也同样出于迫切的实际需要。”

languages.text: «Este orden se estableció por orden de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes, no del Administratum. Le aseguro que su participación en el tribunal no trata solo de respetar una tradición ancestral, sino de responder a una necesidad urgente».
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: «Este orden se estableció por orden de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes, no del Administratum. Le aseguro que su participación en el tribunal no trata solo de respetar una tradición ancestral, sino de responder a una necesidad urgente».

languages.text: 「この体制は帝国行政局ではなく、前任のローグトレーダーたちによって確立されました。私は、あなたが法廷に参加することが単なる古い伝統への敬意からでなく、緊急に必要とされているからであることを断言します」
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: 「この体制は帝国行政局ではなく、前任のローグトレーダーたちによって確立されました。私は、あなたが法廷に参加することが単なる古い伝統への敬意からでなく、緊急に必要とされているからであることを断言します」

languages.text: "Bu düzeni kuran Administratum değil, geçmiş Hür Tacirlerdir. Mahkemeye katılımınızın eski bir geleneğe saygı göstergesinden ibaret olmaktan ziyade aynı zamanda acil bir gereklilik olduğunu da temin ederim."
languages.original_text: "This order of things was established by previous Rogue Traders, not the Administratum. I assure you that your participation in the court of law is not only an homage to an ancient tradition but also an urgent necessity."

traits.locale_text: "Bu düzeni kuran Administratum değil, geçmiş Hür Tacirlerdir. Mahkemeye katılımınızın eski bir geleneğe saygı göstergesinden ibaret olmaktan ziyade aynı zamanda acil bir gereklilik olduğunu da temin ederim."
